mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cart_id, p.p_id As p_id, p.p_name AS p_name, c.amount as amount, p.p_price AS p_price, (p_price * amount) money FROM t_product p, tbl_cart c WHERE p.p_id = c.p_id ORDER BY c.cart_id
SELECT NVL(SUM(p_price * amount), 0) money FROM tbl_cart c, t_product p WHERE c.p_id = p.p_id
